TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CodeStatementCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一个简单的集合对象，该对象可用于存储一组 对象。The class provides a simple collection object that can be used to store a set of objects. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类。The following example demonstrates how to use the class. 该示例创建类的新实例，并使用几种方法，将语句添加到集合，返回其索引，以及添加或删除特定索引处的语句。The example creates a new instance of the class and uses several methods to add statements to the collection, return their index, and add or remove statements at a specific index point.
